name: Karnataka
description: Top tourist state in South India, known for its tech hub, palaces, and national parks.

name: Goa
description: Famous for its beaches, nightlife, and places of worship.

name: Rajasthan
description: Known for its magnificent forts, palaces, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Kerala
description: God's Own Country, famous for its backwaters, beaches, and Ayurvedic treatments.

name: Maharashtra
description: Home to the bustling metropolis of Mumbai and the serene Western Ghats.

name: Himachal Pradesh
description: 'Land of the Gods', known for its Himalayan landscapes and popular hill-stations.

name: Uttarakhand
description: 'Devbhumi' or the 'Land of the Gods', famous for pilgrimage sites and trekking.

name: Jammu and Kashmir
description: 'Paradise on Earth', known for its scenic splendor and snow-capped mountains.

name: Sikkim
description: A jewel in the Himalayas, known for its pristine beauty and stunning views of Kanchenjunga.

name: West Bengal
description: Rich in culture and heritage, home to Kolkata, Darjeeling, and the Sundarbans.

name: Tamil Nadu
description: Known for its Dravidian-style Hindu temples, classical dance, and beautiful coastline.

name: Uttar Pradesh
description: The heartland of India, home to the Taj Mahal, Varanasi, and ancient cities.

name: Madhya Pradesh
description: 'The Heart of India', known for its national parks, wildlife, and historical sites.

name: Gujarat
description: Famous for its vibrant culture, Rann of Kutch, and being the land of Mahatma Gandhi.

name: Delhi
description: The national capital, a vast metropolitan area with a rich history and Mughal-era monuments.
